column1: In the case of Eksath Engineru Saha Samanya Kamkaru Samithiya v. De Silva; 73 NLR 260
‘He submitted therefore that mandamus should not therefore issue ordering them
to  function as an Industrial Court as they were now not qualified to do so. I think
there is substance in this submission. Parties obviously cannot be ordered to do
what they are not qualified to do and are therefore unable to do. Lex non cogit ad
impossibilia. The application is therefore dismissed but without costs.’
